All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
App
Main application class for the Boba POS system.
CartManager
Singleton class to manage the shopping cart across the application.
ChartGenerator
Utility class for generating and styling JavaFX charts for the sales dashboard.
CheckoutController
Controller for the checkout screen.
DatabaseController
Controller for the database testing screen.
DateRangeFilter
Class representing a date range filter for sales reports.
DateRangeFilter.ViewType
Defines the standard predefined date ranges for reports.
dbSetup
 
Employee
Represents an employee record within the POS system.
EmployeeManagementController
Controller for managing employee records in the POS system.
IngredientModel
Represents an ingredient record within the POS system.
InventoryController
Controller class for managing inventory operations in the application.
JdbcMenuRepository
Provides a JDBC implementation of the MenuRepository interface for performing CRUD operations on menu items and their associated ingredients.
LoginController
JavaFX controller for the login view in the POS application.
MainDashboardController
Controller class for the main dashboard interface of the application.
ManagerDashboardController
Controller for the manager dashboard interface.
MenuCatalog
Provides a global, observable catalog of menu items used throughout the POS system.
MenuCatalog.MenuOption
Represents a single immutable menu option entry.
MenuEditorController
Controller class responsible for managing the Menu Editor interface.
MenuEditorController.MenuRow
Data model representing a single menu item in the TableView.
MenuItemIngredientLink
Represents a link (join record) between a MenuItemModel and an IngredientModel.
MenuItemModel
Represents a menu item in the POS system.
MenuRepository
Defines the contract for repository operations involving menu items, their associated ingredients, and the join relationships between them.
OrderItemController
Controller for the order item customization screen in the POS system.
ReportRow
Represents a single row of data displayed in the X-Report table.
SalesReportController
Controller for the Sales Report dashboard (salesDashboard.fxml).
SalesReportController.EmployeePerformanceRow
Row data for Employee Performance table.
SalesReportController.InventoryUsageRow
Row data for Inventory Usage table.
SalesReportController.PaymentMethodRow
Row data for Payment Methods table.
SalesReportController.ProductSalesRow
Row data for Product Sales table.
SalesReportService
Service class for handling database queries related to sales reports.
SalesReportService.DailySalesData
Class representing sales aggregated by a specific day.
SalesReportService.HourlySalesData
Class representing sales aggregated by a specific hour.
SalesReportService.InventoryUsageData
Class representing the total usage of a specific ingredient.
SalesReportService.PopularItem
Class representing a popular item or modifier.
SalesReportService.SalesMetrics
Class representing different types of sales metrics.
XReportController
Controller class for the X-Report view in the POS Manager System.
ZReportController
Controller for the Z-Report view in the POS system.
